        <span class="Icon Icon--follower Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="typeahead-in-conversation-text">In this conversation</span>
      </div>
      <img class="avatar size32" alt="">
      <span class="typeahead-user-item-info account-group">
        <span class="fullname"></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified js-verified hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span><span class="Icon Icon--protected js-protected hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Protected Tweets</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b></b></span>
      </span>
      <span class="typeahead-social-context"></span>
    </a>
  </li>
  <li role="presentation" class="js-selectable typeahead-accounts-shortcut js-shortcut"><a role="option" class="js-nav" href="" data-search-query="" data-query-source="typeahead_click" data-shortcut="true" data-ds="account_search"></a></li>
</ul>

    <ul role="presentation" class="typeahead-items typeahead-trend-locations-list">

  <div role="presentation" class="typeahead-empty-suggestions">
    Suggested users

.module .list-link:focus,

.stats a:focus strong,

.find-friends-sources li:hover .source,

.stream-item a:focus .fullname,

.stream-item .view-all-supplements:focus,

.tweet .time a:focus,

.client-and-actions a:focus,

.dismiss-btn:hover b,

.tweet .context .pretty-link:hover s,
.tweet .context .pretty-link:hover b,
.tweet .context .pretty-link:focus s,
.tweet .context .pretty-link:focus b,

.list .username a:hover,
.list .username a:focus,
.list-membership-container .create-a-list,
.list-membership-container .create-a-list:hover,



.card .list-details a:hover,
.card .list-details a:focus,
.card .card-body:hover .attribution,
.card .card-body .attribution:focus,
.new-tweets-bar,



.remove-background-btn,



.stream-item-activity-notification .latest-tweet .tweet-row a:hover,
.stream-item-activity-notification .latest-tweet .tweet-row a:focus,
.stream-item-activity-notification .latest-tweet .tweet-row a:hover b,
.stream-item-activity-notification .latest-tweet .tweet-row a:focus b {
    color: #6471AD;
}




  /* hover state for found media items */
  .FoundMediaSearch--keyboard .FoundMediaSearch-focusable.is-focused {
    border-color: #6471AD;
  }

  /* hover state for photo select button*/
  .photo-selector:hover .btn,
  .icon-btn:hover,
  .icon-btn:active,
  .icon-btn.active,
  .icon-btn.enabled {
    border-color: #6471AD;
    border-color: rgba(100,113,173,.5);
    color: #6471AD;
  }

  /* hover state for photo select button*/
  .photo-selector:hover .btn,
  .icon-btn:hover {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0), rgba(100,113,173,.1));
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00FFFFFF', endColorstr='#196471AD'); /* IE8-9 */
  }

  .icon-btn.disabled,
  .icon-btn.disabled:hover,
  .icon-btn[disabled],
  .icon-btn[aria-disabled=true] {
    color: #6471AD;
  }

  /* tweet-btn can have primary-btn class as well so the following rules ensure that the correct background color is applied */
  .tweet-btn,
  .tweet-btn:focus {
    background-color: #6471AD;
    background: rgba(100,113,173,.8);
  }

  .tweet-btn:hover,
  .tweet-btn:active,
  .tweet-btn.active {
    background-color: #6471AD;
  }

  .tweet-btn.btn.disabled,
  .tweet-btn.btn.disabled:hover,
  .tweet-btn.btn[disabled],
  .tweet-btn.btn[aria-disabled=true] {
    background: #6471AD;
  }

  .btn:focus,
  .btn.focus,
  .Button:focus,
  .EmojiPicker-item.is-focused {
    box-shadow:
      0 0 0 1px #fff,
      0 0 0 3px rgba(100, 113, 173, 0.5);
  }

  .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(100, 113, 173, 0.5);
  }

  /* highlighting when navigate through timeline stream table view with j & k. */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item[tabindex="-1"]:focus {
    outline: 3px solid rgba(100, 113, 173, 0.5) !important;
  }

  /* box-shadow does not work with table tr element */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  /**
   * 1. Bring actionable tweet to top when active to ensure border
   *    highlighting wraps entire tweet. Value must be at least at if not
   *    higher than the z-index value of ProfileHeading to ensure first
   *    tweet in timeline receives border on all four sides.
   *    NOTE: z-index should be 2 to avoid conflicts with .ProfileCanopy and .ProfileCard-avatarLink
   */

  .js-stream-item.is-selected:focus .ProfileCard,
  .QuoteTweet:hover,
  .QuoteTweet:focus,
  .QuoteTweet:active {
    border-color: rgba(100, 113, 173, 0.5);
    z-index: 2; /* 1 */
  }

  .global-dm-nav.new.with-count .dm-new {
    background: #fff;
  }

  .global-dm-nav.new.with-count .dm-new .count-inner {
    background: #6471AD;
  }

  .global-nav .people .count .count-inner {
    background: #6471AD;
  }

  .dropdown-menu li > a:hover,
  .dropdown-menu li > a:focus,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:hover,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:focus,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.is-focused,
  .dropdown-menu li:hover .dropdown-link,
  .dropdown-menu li:focus .dropdown-link,
  .dropdown-menu .typeahead-recent-search-item.selected,
  .dropdown-menu .typeahead-saved-search-item.selected,
  .dropdown-menu .selected a,
  .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.selected {
    background-color: #6471AD !important;
  }

}

}

    </div>
    <div class="EmojiPicker dropdown is-loading">
  <button type="button" class="EmojiPicker-trigger js-dropdown-toggle js-tooltip u-textUserColorHover"
      title="Add emoji" data-delay="150" aria-hidden="true">
    <span class="Icon Icon--smiley"></span>
    <span class="text u-hiddenVisually">
      Add emoji
    </span>
  </button>
  <div class="EmojiPicker-dropdownMenu dropdown-menu" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="EmojiPicker-content Caret Caret--stroked"></div>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>
  <div class="RichEditor-mozillaCursorWorkaround">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
            </div>
          </div>

            <div class="tweet-loading">
  <div class="spinner-bigger"></div>

     <div id="geo-disabled-dropdown">

    <span class="caret-inner"></span>
  </div>
  <ul>
    <li class="geo-not-enabled-yet">
      <h2>Add a location to your Tweets</h2>
      <p>
        When you tweet with a location, Twitter stores that location.&#32;
        You can switch location on/off before each Tweet and always have the option to delete your location history.
        <a href="http://support.twitter.com/forums/26810/entries/78525" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a>
      </p>
      <div>
        <button type="button" class="geo-turn-on btn primary-btn">Turn location on</button>
        <button type="button" class="geo-not-now btn-link">Not now</button>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

    </tr>

    <span class="Icon Icon--search UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>

  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    See the latest conversations about any topic instantly.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="UIWalkthrough-step UIWalkthrough-step--moments">
  <h3 class="UIWalkthrough-title">
    <span class="Icon Icon--lightning UIWalkthrough-icon"></span>
    Never miss a Moment
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    Catch up instantly on the best stories happening as they unfold.
  </p>
</div>
      </div>

      <div class="modal-footer">
        <button class="btn u-floatLeft plain-btn UIWalkthrough-button js-previous-step">Back</button>
        <button class="btn UIWalkthrough-button js-next-step js-initial-focus">Next</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <div class="IconTextContainer">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
          <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
        </span>
      </div>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <div class="HeartAnimationContainer">
        <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <div class="IconTextContainer">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
          <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
        </span>
      </div>
  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <div class="HeartAnimationContainer">
        <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <div class="IconTextContainer">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
          <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>

  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));

        //created: 11/24/2014
        var asiPqTag = false;
        ChamandoURLAudienceScience = {
          'init': function(){
            ChamandoURLAudienceScience.urlRequisicaoDinamica();
          },
          'urlRequisicaoDinamica': function(){
            var cb = new Date().getTime();
            var asiPqTag = false;
            var urlModificada = "https://pq-direct.revsci.net/pql?placementIdList=uqMDA5,frDqFT&cb="+cb;

              dataType : 'script',
              chache : true,
              url : urlModificada,
              success : function() {}
            });
          }
        };

          <script type="text/javascript">
            function fechaAds(){
              ads=document.getElementById('ads-sniffer');
              ads.parentNode.removeChild(ads);
            }
          </script>
          <a id="closeBtn" style="z-index:1; cursor:pointer; position: absolute; right:0; top:0; width:61px; height:17px; background-image:url(https://img.r7.com/images/2017/01/05/957hd2p3f5_8gp35i3xl7_file)" onclick="fechaAds()">&#160;</a>

              document.getElementById('ads-sniffer').style.display = 'block';

          <div class="header-menu-horizontal-search-bar">
             <form action="http://busca.r7.com" method="get" class="r7-top-video-main-form is-video" id="r7-top-video-search-form">
              <input type="text" class="r7-top-video-input maximum-radius-only-left pull-left large-input" placeholder="O que você está procurando?" id="r7-top-video-search" name="q" />
              <input type="hidden" name="media" value />
              <button type="submit" class="maximum-radius-only-right pull-left text-uppercase r7-top-video-btn">ok</button>

  <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
      var time = null,
          targetItem = $('.target-item');

      function hideShareIcons () {
        targetItem.fadeOut();
        $('.r7opened').removeClass('r7opened');
      }

      $('.open-item').hover(function() {
        var self = $(this);

        if(!self.hasClass('r7opened')){
          hideShareIcons();
        }
        clearTimeout(time);

        self.find('.target-item').stop(true, true).fadeIn("fast");
        self.addClass('r7opened');
      }, function(){
        time = setTimeout(hideShareIcons, 500);
      });

      var $searchBar = $('.header-menu-horizontal-search-bar'),
          $socialAndSearchHide = $('.header-menu-horizontal-social-items, .header-menu-horizontal-send-video'),
          $topVideoFilter = $searchBar.find('.r7-top-video-filter');

      $(document).on('click', function(e) {
        var t = $(e.target),
            mod = 'header-menu-horizontal',
            ignoredClasses = [mod + '-search-bar', mod + '-search', 'open-search-bar', 'search-icon', 'r7-top-video-main-form', 'r7-top-video-filter-opener', 'r7-top-video-input', 'r7-top-video-btn'],
            hasClass = true;

        _.each(ignoredClasses, function(item) {
          if(t.hasClass(item)) {
            hasClass = false;
          }
        });

        if (hasClass) {
          $searchBar.hide();
          $topVideoFilter.removeClass('is-visible');
          $socialAndSearchHide.removeClass('is-hidden').addClass('is-visible');
        }
      });

      $('.open-search-bar')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          $searchBar.show();
          $socialAndSearchHide.addClass('is-hidden');
        });

      var checkInput = function() {
        var t = $(this), label = t.parent().find('label');

        if (t.val().length > 0) {
          label.fadeIn();
        }
        else {
          label.fadeOut();
        }
      };

      $('#login-input, #pass-input').on('focus blur keyup', checkInput);

      $('.search-action')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e){
          return $('.header-menu-horizontal-search').val().length > 0;
        });

      var offset = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').offset().top;

      $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset', offset);

      var $window = $(window);

      $window.scroll(function(){
        var stickyShareTop = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset');
          scrollTop = $window.scrollTop();
          if (scrollTop > stickyShareTop) {
            $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('#header-menu-horizontal:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info:not(.bg-sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.pre-main-content:not(.sticky)').addClass('bg-sticky');
          }
          else {
            if ($('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').hasClass('sticky')){
              $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').removeClass('sticky');
              $('#header-menu-horizontal').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.pre-main-content').removeClass('bg-sticky');
            }
          }
      });
    });
  </script>

            <script>
             r7ad.printGAds([204,792], {pos:"bg", context:"left"}).success(function() {
               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

          <div id="r7ad-bgRight">
            <script>
             r7ad.printGAds([204,792], {pos:"bg", context:"right"}).success(function() {
               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

        <div class="pre-main-content">

           
          <div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="chrome">
            <div>
             
            </div>

                    <div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">
          <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      if ((event.slot.getTargeting('pos') == "bg")){
        if(!event.isEmpty){
          r7adv.has_bg = true;
        }
      }
    });

    $(function() {
      postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar', '<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');
    });
  </script>
    <div class="r7-adv-skyscraper scrollable" id="r7-skyscraper-sidebar">
      
    </div>

      </div>
      <a href="http://noticias.r7.com/videos/internauta-conquista-visita-ao-camarim-de-ticiane-pinheiro-com-o-r7-pontos/idmedia/53c440e50cf20969fd67302f.html" class="destaque-title-link"  title="Internauta conquista visita ao camarim de Ticiane Pinheiro com o R7 Pontos">
        Internauta conquista visita ao camarim de Ticiane Pinheiro com o R7 Pontos
      </a>
      <div class="hover"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    (function() {
      // console.log('.pop-chamada-duas-colunas-menor-542503be1d420626a7001491 .destaque-social-icon');
      $('#pop-chamada-duas-colunas-menor-542503be1d420626a7001491 .destaque-social-icon').on('click', function(e) {
        e && e.preventDefault();

        var options = 'width=600,height=300,menubar=no,location=no,resizable=no,scrollbars=no',
          url = $(this).attr('data-href');

        window.open(url, 'R7', options);
      })
    } ());
  </script>
</div>

                  </div>

        <!-- Tracking -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
    // criando elemento para url canônica
    var linkCanonical   = document.createElement('link');
    linkCanonical.href  = "" || location.href;
    linkCanonical.rel   = "canonical";

    (function() {
      // adicionando metatag referente a url canonica dentro da tag <head/>
      document.head.appendChild(linkCanonical);

      //GOOGLE ANALYTICS UNIVERSAL 
      (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
          i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
          i[r] = i[r] || function() {
              (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
          }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
          a = s.createElement(o),
              m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
          a.async = 1;
          a.src = g;
          m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
      })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

      ga('create', 'UA-10631407-1', 'auto');

      //evita ReferenceError
      dataLayer = (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined')? dataLayer : {};
      if(dataLayer.page_name         ) {ga('set', 'dimension1',  dataLayer.page_name         );}
      if(dataLayer.site_section      ) {ga('set', 'dimension2',  dataLayer.site_section      );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section       ) {ga('set', 'dimension3',  dataLayer.sub_section       );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_2     ) {ga('set', 'dimension4',  dataLayer.sub_section_2     );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_3     ) {ga('set', 'dimension5',  dataLayer.sub_section_3     );}
      if(dataLayer.content_id        ) {ga('set', 'dimension6',  dataLayer.content_id        );}
      if(dataLayer.content_type      ) {ga('set', 'dimension7',  dataLayer.content_type      );}
      if(dataLayer.content_title     ) {ga('set', 'dimension8',  dataLayer.content_title     );}
      if(dataLayer.publication_date  ) {ga('set', 'dimension9',  dataLayer.publication_date  );}
      if(dataLayer.page_url          ) {ga('set', 'dimension10', dataLayer.page_url          );}
      if(dataLayer.short_url         ) {ga('set', 'dimension11', dataLayer.short_url         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_age         ) {ga('set', 'dimension12', dataLayer.tailt_age         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_gender      ) {ga('set', 'dimension13', dataLayer.tailt_gender      );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_city        ) {ga('set', 'dimension14', dataLayer.tailt_city        );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_state       ) {ga('set', 'dimension15', dataLayer.tailt_state       );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_country     ) {ga('set', 'dimension16', dataLayer.tailt_country     );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_profiles    ) {ga('set', 'dimension17', dataLayer.tailt_profiles    );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    ) {ga('set', 'dimension18', dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    );}
      if(dataLayer.minute            ) {ga('set', 'dimension19', dataLayer.minute            );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_photoGallery) {ga('set', 'dimension20', dataLayer.embed_photoGallery);}
      if(dataLayer.embed_poll        ) {ga('set', 'dimension21', dataLayer.embed_poll        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_quiz        ) {ga('set', 'dimension22', dataLayer.embed_quiz        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_playlist    ) {ga('set', 'dimension23', dataLayer.embed_playlist    );}


      dataLayer.reset_content_id = function(content_id) {
        dataLayer.content_id = content_id;
        ga('set', 'dimension6', dataLayer.content_id);
      }
      dataLayer.reset_content_type = function(content_type) {
        dataLayer.content_type = content_type;
        ga('set', 'dimension7', dataLayer.content_type);
      }

      ga('send', 'pageview');

      var adblock_status = (Boolean( document.getElementById( 'ads-container-r7adv' ) ))? 'OFF' : 'ON';
      ga('send', 'event', 'Adblock', 'Adblock-'+adblock_status, {nonInteraction: true });
    })();
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    if (typeof window.R7HashAudience != 'undefined') {
      window.R7HashPath = 'https://adv.r7.com/audience.js?s=' + window.R7HashAudience;
      document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="' + window.R7HashPath + '"><\/scr' + 'ipt>');
    }
  </script>

    <script>
      //submenu nao deve ser menor do que o menu pai
      $(".r7-nav-menu-secondary-list").each(function(index){
        var child_width = $(this).outerWidth(),
            parent_width = $(this).closest('.r7-nav-menu-list-item').outerWidth();

        if(child_width < parent_width) {
          $(this).width(parent_width);
        }
      });
    </script>

        cleanSearchField('r7-frm-search-keyword');
      });
      Logger.setLevel(0);

//]]>
</script>

    </script>

    <!-- TailTarget Tag Manager TT-9964-3/CT-23 -->
    <script>
      (function(i){
      var ts = document.createElement('script');
      ts.type = 'text/javascript';
      ts.async = true;
      ts.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'tags.t.tailtarget.com/t3m.js?i=' + i;
      var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      s.parentNode.insertBefore(ts, s);
      })('TT-9964-3/CT-23');
    </script>
    <!-- End TailTarget Tag Manager -->
